text: Net cash flow generated from investing activities was ₹ 107.42 lakhs for Fiscal 2024, which was primarily attributable to the Purchase of property, plant & equipment of ₹ 55.02 lakhs, sales of investment of ₹ 0.25 lakhs which was primarily offset by proceeds from sale of property, plant & equipment of ₹ 2.85 lakhs and proceeds from interest, dividend and rent income of ₹ 159.34 lakhs.

Net cash flow used in investing activities was ₹ 80.22 lakhs for Fiscal 2023, which was primarily attributable to the Purchase of property, plant & equipment of ₹ 222.91 lakhs, purchase of investment of ₹ 6.74 lakhs, which was primarily offset by proceeds from sale of property, plant & equipment of ₹ 15.31 lakhs and proceeds from interest, dividend and rent income of ₹ 134.12 lakhs.
### Net cash flow (used in) financing activities

Net cash used in financing activities was ₹ 1,332.86 lakhs for Fiscal 2025, mainly consisting proceeds from long-term borrowing of ₹ 31.97 lakhs, re-payment of short-term borrowing of ₹ 690.84 lakhs and long-term borrowings of ₹ 73.50 lakhs, and Interest paid on such borrowings of ₹ 600.49 lakhs.

Net cash used in financing activities was ₹ 458.50 lakhs for Fiscal 2024, mainly consisting proceeds from long-term borrowing of ₹ 56.37 lakhs and short-term borrowing of ₹ 87.62 lakhs, repayment of long-term borrowings of ₹ 78.08 lakhs, and Interest paid on such borrowings of ₹ 524.41 lakhs.

Net cash used in financing activities was ₹ 916.48 lakhs for Fiscal 2023, mainly consisting proceeds from long-term borrowing of ₹ 109.88 lakhs and short-term borrowing of ₹ 425.67 lakhs, repayment of long-term borrowings of ₹ 1,011.84 lakhs, and Interest paid on such borrowings of ₹ 440.19 lakhs.
